item.title: Cloud, What is Next
item.description: We will be looking into the cloud and if you werenâ€™t thinking about these concepts during your migration should be something you start talking about. The topics that will be presented all deserve their own post, and will get one, this is just to get you to start thinking about where you are and what the migration means for you.
